argument.description: An expression that returns a value of one of the following built-in data types: a DATE or a TIMESTAMP.

description: The ROUND_TIMESTAMP scalar function returns a TIMESTAMP based on a provided argument (expression), rounded to the unit specified in another argument (format-string).
